channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins Project -- Jenkins
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins Project -- Jenkins

item.title: CVE-2019-10353|2024-08-04T22:17:20.468Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins
item.description: CSRF tokens in Jenkins 2.185 and earlier, LTS 2.176.1 and earlier did not expire, thereby allowing attackers able to obtain them to bypass CSRF protection.

item.title: CVE-2020-2101|2024-08-04T07:01:39.702Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins
item.description: Jenkins 2.218 and earlier, LTS 2.204.1 and earlier did not use a constant-time comparison function for validating connection secrets, which could potentially allow an attacker to use a timing attack to obtain this secret.

item.title: CVE-2019-10403|2024-08-04T22:24:17.504Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins
item.description: Jenkins 2.196 and earlier, LTS 2.176.3 and earlier did not escape the SCM tag name on the tooltip for SCM tag actions, resulting in a stored XSS vulnerability exploitable by users able to control SCM tag names for these actions.

item.title: CVE-2020-2229|2024-08-04T07:01:41.164Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins
item.description: Jenkins 2.251 and earlier, LTS 2.235.3 and earlier does not escape the tooltip content of help icons, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2019-10383|2024-08-04T22:17:20.544Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins
item.description: A stored cross-site scripting vulnerability in Jenkins 2.191 and earlier, LTS 2.176.2 and earlier allowed attackers with Overall/Administer permission to configure the update site URL to inject arbitrary HTML and JavaScript in update center web pages.

item.title: CVE-2020-2221|2024-08-04T07:01:41.082Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins
item.description: Jenkins 2.244 and earlier, LTS 2.235.1 and earlier does not escape the upstream job's display name shown as part of a build cause, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2019-10406|2024-08-04T22:24:16.966Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins
item.description: Jenkins 2.196 and earlier, LTS 2.176.3 and earlier did not restrict or filter values set as Jenkins URL in the global configuration, resulting in a stored XSS vulnerability exploitable by attackers with Overall/Administer permission.

item.title: CVE-2020-2099|2024-08-04T07:01:39.729Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins
item.description: Jenkins 2.213 and earlier, LTS 2.204.1 and earlier improperly reuses encryption key parameters in the Inbound TCP Agent Protocol/3, allowing unauthorized attackers with knowledge of agent names to obtain the connection secrets for those agents, which can be used to connect to Jenkins, impersonating those agents.

item.title: CVE-2019-10354|2024-08-04T22:17:20.331Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins
item.description: A vulnerability in the Stapler web framework used in Jenkins 2.185 and earlier, LTS 2.176.1 and earlier allowed attackers to access view fragments directly, bypassing permission checks and possibly obtain sensitive information.

item.title: CVE-2020-2231|2024-08-04T07:01:41.196Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins
item.description: Jenkins 2.251 and earlier, LTS 2.235.3 and earlier does not escape the remote address of the host starting a build via 'Trigger builds remotely', resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by users with Job/Configure permission or knowledge of the Authentication Token.

item.title: CVE-2020-2163|2024-08-04T07:01:40.841Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins
item.description: Jenkins 2.227 and earlier, LTS 2.204.5 and earlier improperly processes HTML content of list view column headers, resulting in a stored XSS vulnerability exploitable by users able to control column headers.

item.title: CVE-2019-10401|2024-08-04T22:24:16.959Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins
item.description: In Jenkins 2.196 and earlier, LTS 2.176.3 and earlier, the f:expandableTextBox form control interpreted its content as HTML when expanded, resulting in a stored XSS vulnerability exploitable by users with permission to define its contents (typically Job/Configure).

item.title: CVE-2020-2100|2024-08-04T07:01:39.694Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins
item.description: Jenkins 2.218 and earlier, LTS 2.204.1 and earlier was vulnerable to a UDP amplification reflection denial of service attack on port 33848.

item.title: CVE-2020-2222|2024-08-04T07:01:41.127Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins
item.description: Jenkins 2.244 and earlier, LTS 2.235.1 and earlier does not escape the job name in the 'Keep this build forever' badge tooltip, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2019-10384|2024-08-04T22:17:20.571Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins
item.description: Jenkins 2.191 and earlier, LTS 2.176.2 and earlier allowed users to obtain CSRF tokens without an associated web session ID, resulting in CSRF tokens that did not expire and could be used to bypass CSRF protection for the anonymous user.

item.title: CVE-2019-10405|2024-08-04T22:24:16.961Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins
item.description: Jenkins 2.196 and earlier, LTS 2.176.3 and earlier printed the value of the "Cookie" HTTP request header on the /whoAmI/ URL, allowing attackers exploiting another XSS vulnerability to obtain the HTTP session cookie despite it being marked HttpOnly.

item.title: CVE-2020-2102|2024-08-04T07:01:39.728Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins
item.description: Jenkins 2.218 and earlier, LTS 2.204.1 and earlier used a non-constant time comparison function when validating an HMAC.

item.title: CVE-2020-2105|2024-08-04T07:01:40.735Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins
item.description: REST API endpoints in Jenkins 2.218 and earlier, LTS 2.204.1 and earlier were vulnerable to clickjacking attacks.

item.title: CVE-2019-10352|2024-08-04T22:17:20.356Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins
item.description: A path traversal vulnerability in Jenkins 2.185 and earlier, LTS 2.176.1 and earlier in core/src/main/java/hudson/model/FileParameterValue.java allowed attackers with Job/Configure permission to define a file parameter with a file name outside the intended directory, resulting in an arbitrary file write on the Jenkins master when scheduling a build.

item.title: CVE-2020-2220|2024-08-04T07:01:41.248Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins
item.description: Jenkins 2.244 and earlier, LTS 2.235.1 and earlier does not escape the agent name in the build time trend page, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2020-2230|2024-08-04T07:01:41.176Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins
item.description: Jenkins 2.251 and earlier, LTS 2.235.3 and earlier does not escape the project naming strategy description, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by users with Overall/Manage permission.

item.title: CVE-2020-2161|2024-08-04T07:01:40.978Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins
item.description: Jenkins 2.227 and earlier, LTS 2.204.5 and earlier does not properly escape node labels that are shown in the form validation for label expressions on job configuration pages, resulting in a stored XSS vulnerability exploitable by users able to define node labels.

item.title: CVE-2020-2162|2024-08-04T07:01:40.698Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins
item.description: Jenkins 2.227 and earlier, LTS 2.204.5 and earlier does not set Content-Security-Policy headers for files uploaded as file parameters to a build, resulting in a stored XSS vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2019-10404|2024-08-04T22:24:16.950Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins
item.description: Jenkins 2.196 and earlier, LTS 2.176.3 and earlier did not escape the reason why a queue items is blcoked in tooltips, resulting in a stored XSS vulnerability exploitable by users able to control parts of the reason a queue item is blocked, such as label expressions not matching any idle executors.

item.title: CVE-2020-2103|2024-08-04T07:01:39.590Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins
item.description: Jenkins 2.218 and earlier, LTS 2.204.1 and earlier exposed session identifiers on a user's detail object in the whoAmI diagnostic page.

item.title: CVE-2019-10402|2024-08-04T22:24:16.945Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins
item.description: In Jenkins 2.196 and earlier, LTS 2.176.3 and earlier, the f:combobox form control interpreted its item labels as HTML, resulting in a stored XSS vulnerability exploitable by users with permission to define its contents.

item.title: CVE-2020-2160|2024-08-04T07:01:40.917Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins
item.description: Jenkins 2.227 and earlier, LTS 2.204.5 and earlier uses different representations of request URL paths, which allows attackers to craft URLs that allow bypassing CSRF protection of any target URL.

item.title: CVE-2020-2104|2024-08-04T07:01:39.714Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins
item.description: Jenkins 2.218 and earlier, LTS 2.204.1 and earlier allowed users with Overall/Read access to view a JVM memory usage chart.

item.title: CVE-2020-2223|2024-08-04T07:01:41.099Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins
item.description: Jenkins 2.244 and earlier, LTS 2.235.1 and earlier does not escape correctly the 'href' attribute of links to downstream jobs displayed in the build console page, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting vulnerability.
